patthana8.49:1.1: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso ca nanokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.49:2.1: Nanokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.49:3.1: Nokilesañca nanokilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.49:4.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
